# 二.数据输入（开关）

::: tip 前言 --> 开/关组件特点
**开关组件**两种状态供给选择
:::

## 1.目录结构

```sh
├── switch
│   ├── switch.vue
│   └── index.js
```

## 2.组件封装

### 2.1 switch

- 格式一
<<< components/switch/src/swiicon-texttch.vue

- 格式二
<<< components/switch/src/swiicon-texttch.vue

## 3.使用案例

:::demo

```vue
<template>
  <vue-switch
    :src="`${
      open
        ? 'data:image/png;base64,'
        : 'data:image/png;base64,'
    }`"
    @select="handleSwitch"
  >
    <div v-if="open" style="position: absolute">ddddddd</div>
  </vue-switch>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {}
  },
  methods: {
    handleSwitch() {},
  },
}
</script>
```

:::

:::demo

```vue
<template>
  <vue-switch
    src="data:image/webp;base64,"
    @select="handleSwitch"
  />
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {}
  },
  methods: {
    handleSwitch() {},
  },
}
</script>
```

:::

:::demo

```vue
<template>
  <vue-switch
    src="data:image/webp;base64,"
    @select="handleSwitch"
  />
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {}
  },
  methods: {
    handleSwitch() {},
  },
}
</script>
```

:::

::: tip 总结
通过对前端组件的分析，需要重点关注组件中易变性对组件封装的影响，它会对组件的可复用性、可扩展性产生很大影响
:::
